name: Boomer chef

topics.topic_text: I'd like to buy some food.
topics.response_text: Here is what we have available.

description:
Chef Riley is a 45 year-old Caucasian Male.

A skilled cook working for the Boomers at Nellis Air Force Base. Chef Riley is responsible for preparing meals for the faction members and managing the food inventory in the mess hall.

Chef Riley's Personality: Practical and no-nonsense, Chef Riley takes pride in his cooking and is protective of his supplies. He's somewhat territorial about his kitchen but willing to trade food for valuable ingredients or caps. Despite his gruff exterior, he has a soft spot for wastelanders who show respect for the Boomers.

Chef Riley's Backstory: Before the Great War, Riley served as a military cook at Nellis Air Force Base. When the bombs fell, he took shelter in the base's underground facilities and has been with the Boomers ever since. Over the decades, he's become one of the most respected members of the faction, valued for his culinary skills and knowledge of pre-War food preservation techniques.
